name: Gwynet's Quest
description:
A courageous heroine.

A lost friend.

A dangerous journey.

Gwynet’s Quest is a short fantasy adventure in the light-epic tone of JRPGs like Final Fantasy VI.

It represents my first foray into design with RPGMaker VX Ace. It may have some rough edges or amateur mistakes--constructive criticism is appreciated! I hope you enjoy your time with Gwynet, Tam, Ardal, and Runa as much as I enjoyed writing them.
